document_data.name: Tezzarq
document_data.mainbody: '''Tezzarq''' was a [[drow]] spellspinner in the [[Underdark]] in [[1379 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Tezzarq was a member of [[House Masq'il'yr]].
document_data.History: In 1379 DR, as a birthday gift for his matron mother, Tezzarq decided to buy ten [[elf]] slaves. So he went to [[Skullport]] and hired the slaver [[Lanador]] to fulfill the task. However, Lanador's minions accidentally captured a member of the [[Agents of the Eye]] so when Tezzarq went back to Skullport to pay Lanador and recover the slaves he was confronted by an adventuring party supported by the [[Xanathar]].[[Derek Myers]]. "Eyes on The Ball." ''[[Dungeon (magazine)|Dungeon]]'' #206. Renton, WA: Wizards of the Coast, September 2012.
